nodes.text: Hero's Guide is a supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game published by Wizards of the Coast. It was written by Rodney Thompson and J.D. Wiker, first published in June 2003.

Bold individuals from countless star systems aspire to greatness. But the galaxy's real heroes are the dynamic characters who blaze their own way to fame or infamy. Like them, you possess a unique combination of skills, abilities, and talents that enables you to succeed where others fail. With your vision and drive, you will leave your mark on the galaxy.
